issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Our current check for emulator in determining if we should use the global reference workaround
is returning true for the Kindle Fire. We need to change this conditional to correctly detect
the Kindle as a device and to use JNI global references.

While this bug shouldn't create any stability problems, it may impact performance.
fields.summary: Android: Kindle Fire using global reference workaround

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past few years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
